spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is mostly preserved, but wall thicknesses are inconsistent. Door placement in the hallway area and the transition to the terrace/closet area is slightly distorted. Windows in the living area are present but the proportions of the large bay window are slightly simplified.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent adherence to structural constraints. Roof is removed, all rooms are present, and there are no text labels or UI overlays. Model is correctly floating on a dark neutral background.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement matches the schematic well (sofas, beds, dining table). Some kitchen fixtures are simplified and the scale of the living room rug/table area is slightly off compared to the blueprint.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Strong adherence to low-poly, non-photorealistic aesthetic. Flat shading is utilized effectively. The isometric camera angle is correct.

detected_errors.description: Minor layout distortion in the hallway and entrance area; spatial scaling of walls is slightly thicker than blueprint indicates.
Slight reinterpretation of the terrace/closet area into a single structural block rather than the distinct recessed exterior space shown in the plan.
